title: Will Disney confiscate plastic straws I bring in? - Reddit
body: No. You just won't be able to get one from Disney. [deleted] • 4 yr. ago. mamamiadadamax • 4 yr. ago. No, probably not. Most drinks we got in Disney World a couple of weeks ago still had plastic straws. I like metal straws. scopefragger • 4 yr. ago. We're currently here using something called strawbit.
